question: Who has won the 2018 women's singles title in the Australian Open 2018?
explanation: Caroline Wozniack, a Danish professional tennis player, has won the 2018 women\'s Singles title in the Australian Open 2018. With this, she became the first Danish player to win a Grand Slam singles title by defeating Simona Halep in the final by 7–6, 3–6, 6–4.
